name: Tiny Asteroid
description:
Based on the theme "Start with nothing," you play as a little alien that fell onto a tiny asteroid with nothing.  Collect, farm, upgrade, smelt and harvest to build up your asteroid. Tiny asteroid is a solo game made by JD Parker for Ludum Dare 45.  It is a relaxing game with lofi music by JD Parker.  NOTE: Build the laboratory to unlock an amazing feature :D

Controls:

wasd/arrow keys to move.
Click blue button to open build tree.
Click green button to harvest/use.
Click red button to remove the upgrade and clear the area.

Press R to restart.
